Module kivakit.microservice
Package com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.microservlet

Class MicroservletError

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.microservlet.MicroservletError
public class MicroservletError extends Object
Describes an error. Any hierarchical error code (per IETF RFC 7807) in an OperationStatusMessage subclass, such as Problem or Warning, is included in the error description with the error type (the KivaKit class) and the error message.

Sending

  • sendTo(Listener)

Properties

  • hierarchicalErrorCode()
  • httpStatus()
  • message()
  • type()
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Constructor Details

    • MicroservletError

      protected MicroservletError(com.telenav.kivakit.network.http.HttpStatus httpStatus, String hierarchicalErrorCode, String type, String message, Object... arguments)
      Creates a microservlet error for the given hierarchical error code, error type, and message
      Parameters:
      httpStatus - The HTTP status for this error
      hierarchicalErrorCode - The hierarchical (IETF RFC 8707) error code
      type - The error type, such as Warning or Problem
      message - The message
      arguments - Any arguments to use when formatting the message

  • Method Details

    • microservletError

      public static MicroservletError microservletError(com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Message message)
      Convert the given message into a MicroservletError, if possible
      Parameters:
      message - The message to convert
      Returns:
      The MicroservletError for the message, or null if the message isn't an error
